title: UQJE Women's Wide Leg Baggy Jeans Plus Size Loose Elastic Waist Denim Pants with Deep Pockets Light Blue
description: Premium Quality - Made of very comfortable light weight denim. Soft, Durable, and Skin-friendly.
Trendy and Fun - Loose high waist, elastic waist with drawstring. Big bonus, to have side pockets that are deep and one back pocket.
Super Baggy Fit - Waist to hip ratio is high, so these are great for hiding larger hips.
So Versatile - They look like a long skirt and are super cute dressed up with heals or casual with flip flops.
Occasions - Perfect for home, travel, daily wear, shopping and vacation.
